en.title: Middleware 2
en.subtitle: Complete Wwise audio implementation for game level, mimicking real-world production workflow with spatial audio, dynamic mixing, and Game Syncs integration.

overview.title: Real-World Audio Implementation
overview.text: The goal of this exam assignment was to mimic a real-world implementation scenario. I was provided with a working game build that included a Menu and the First Level, with all events and game parameter changes already implemented. My task was to implement all audio needed to create a fully finished gameplay experience, demonstrating professional Wwise workflow and best practices.

obj1.title: Clean Project Structure
obj1.item1: Follow best practices for Wwise project structure

obj2.title: Technical Implementation
obj2.item2: Setup correct spatialization for in-world sounds
obj2.item4: Apply reverb using provided Game Syncs

obj3.title: Audio Design Quality
obj3.item2: Ensure correctness and loop sounds where needed
obj3.item3: Avoid sync issues and cut-off sounds

feat1.title: Spatial Audio
feat1.desc: 3D spatialization with proper attenuation curves and orientation settings for immersive audio positioning throughout the game world.

feat2.title: Dynamic Mix
feat2.desc: Cohesive mix that adapts to gameplay, ensuring clarity and balance across all audio elements for optimal player experience.

feat3.title: Game Syncs Integration
feat3.desc: Integration of Game Syncs for reverb zones and parameter-driven audio changes, creating responsive and contextual soundscapes.

technical.title: Professional Implementation
technical.text: This project demonstrates professional Wwise implementation skills including event management, Game Sync integration, 3D audio positioning, and mix optimization. The implementation follows industry best practices for memory management and CPU efficiency. All audio assets were carefully selected and processed to create a cohesive sound palette that enhances gameplay while maintaining technical performance standards required for real-time game audio.

nl.title: Middleware 2
nl.subtitle: Volledige Wwise audio-implementatie voor game level, waarbij real-world productie workflow wordt nagebootst met ruimtelijke audio, dynamische mixing en Game Syncs integratie.

overview.title: Real-World Audio Implementatie
overview.text: Het doel van deze examengelegenheid was om een real-world implementatiescenario na te bootsen. Ik kreeg een werkende game build met een Menu en het Eerste Level, met alle events en game parameter veranderingen al geÃ¯mplementeerd. Mijn taak was om alle audio te implementeren die nodig was om een volledig afgewerkte gameplay ervaring te creÃ«ren, waarbij professionele Wwise workflow en best practices werden gedemonstreerd.
